resources.description: Default dimensions, numbers and strings for the AlexaDetail
Public resource definitions for button spacings and dimensions - Hub Small
Public resource definitions for button spacings and dimensions - Hub Medium
Public resource definitions for button spacings and dimensions - Hub Round
Public resource definitions for button spacings and dimensions - TV
Public resource definitions for button spacings and dimensions - TV landscape overlay

AlexaDetailImageLeftVersion.description: AlexaDetail image left version for all 3 hub landscapes & tv fullscreen.

parameters.name: imageHeight
parameters.description: Dimension value to set image height

parameters.name: imageAspectRatio
parameters.description: Aspect ratio of the image. Options are square, round, standard_landscape, standard_portrait, poster_landscape, poster_portrait, widescreen. Default to square

parameters.name: imageScale
parameters.description: Scale setting for the image. Options are none, fill, best-fit, best-fill, best-fit-down. Default to best-fit

parameters.name: imageAlignment
parameters.description: Alignment setting for the image. Options are bottom, bottom-left, bottom-right, center, left, right, top, top-left, top-right. Default to center

parameters.name: imageRoundedCorner
parameters.description: Whether to use rounded corners for the image

parameters.name: imageBlurredBackground
parameters.description: Set a blurred version of the image to appear behind the image to create a visually consistent container size

parameters.name: imageSource
parameters.description: URI for the image

parameters.name: theme
parameters.description: Colors will be switched depending on the specified theme (light/dark). Default to dark theme

parameters.name: headerTitle
parameters.description: Primary text to render in header.

parameters.name: headerSubtitle
parameters.description: Secondary text to render in header.

parameters.name: headerAttributionText
parameters.description: Attribution text to render in header.  Only shown when no headerAttributionImage is provided, and when headerAttributionPrimacy is true, or on a device that shows Title/Subtitle and Attribution.

parameters.name: headerAttributionImage
parameters.description: URL for attribution image source. Only shown when headerAttributionPrimacy is true, or on a device that shows Title/Subtitle and Attribution.

parameters.name: headerAttributionPrimacy
parameters.description: On devices that can only display one element due to screen size, Attribution is prioritized. Setting False displays Title/Subtitle.  Defaults to true.

parameters.name: headerBackButton
parameters.description: Toggle to display back button in header.  Defaults to false.

parameters.name: headerBackButtonAccessibilityLabel
parameters.description: An accessibility label to describe the back button to customers who use a screen reader.

parameters.name: headerBackButtonCommand
parameters.description: Command that is issued when back button is pressed.

parameters.name: headerBackgroundColor
parameters.description: Optional color value to use as background color for Header. Defaults to transparent.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: Color value to use as background color for layout.

parameters.name: backgroundImageSource
parameters.description: URL for background image source.

parameters.name: backgroundVideoSource
parameters.description: URL for background video source.

parameters.name: backgroundScale
parameters.description: Image/video scale to apply to background image/video. Defaults to best-fill.

parameters.name: backgroundAlign
parameters.description: Image/video alignment to apply to background image/video. Defaults to center.

parameters.name: backgroundBlur
parameters.description: Toggle to apply background blur. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundOverlayNoise
parameters.description: Toggle to apply noise to background image. Defaults to false

parameters.name: backgroundColorOverlay
parameters.description: Toggle to apply overlay scrim to background image/video. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundOverlayGradient
parameters.description: Toggle to apply gradient to background image/video. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundVideoAutoPlay
parameters.description: Toggle to autoplay background video(s). Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundVideoAudioTrack
parameters.description: Audio track to play on. Defaults to foreground. EM can select foreground | background | none.

parameters.name: theme
parameters.description: Colors will be switched depending on the specified theme (light/dark). Default to dark theme

parameters.name: headerTitle
parameters.description: Primary text to render in header.

parameters.name: headerSubtitle
parameters.description: Secondary text to render in header.

parameters.name: headerAttributionText
parameters.description: Attribution text to render in header.  Only shown when no headerAttributionImage is provided, and when headerAttributionPrimacy is true, or on a device that shows Title/Subtitle and Attribution.

parameters.name: headerAttributionImage
parameters.description: URL for attribution image source. Only shown when headerAttributionPrimacy is true, or on a device that shows Title/Subtitle and Attribution.

parameters.name: headerAttributionPrimacy
parameters.description: On devices that can only display one element due to screen size, Attribution is prioritized. Setting False displays Title/Subtitle.  Defaults to true.

parameters.name: headerBackButton
parameters.description: Toggle to display back button in header.  Defaults to false.

parameters.name: headerBackButtonAccessibilityLabel
parameters.description: An accessibility label to describe the back button to customers who use a screen reader.

parameters.name: headerBackButtonCommand
parameters.description: Command that is issued when back button is pressed.

parameters.name: headerBackgroundColor
parameters.description: Optional color value to use as background color for Header. Defaults to transparent.

parameters.name: ratingSlotPadding
parameters.description: The adjustable padding between rating item.

parameters.name: ratingSlotMode
parameters.description: The mode for single-asset or multiple-asset.

parameters.name: ratingGraphicType
parameters.description: The type for the rating graphic, options are AVG or image. If user selected image, they need to supply resource in the graphic parameters. Default to AVG if no valued provided.

parameters.name: singleRatingGraphicWidth
parameters.description: The width for single rating graphic.

parameters.name: ratingNumber
parameters.description: The rating for rendering stars

parameters.name: singleRatingGraphic
parameters.description: The resource for rating graphic.

parameters.name: fullRatingGraphic
parameters.description: The resource for full rating AVG. Default to full AVG icon if no value provided.

parameters.name: halfRatingGraphic
parameters.description: The resource for half rating AVG. Default to half AVG icon if no value provided.

parameters.name: emptyRatingGraphic
parameters.description: The resource for empty rating AVG. Default to empty AVG icon if no value provided.

parameters.name: ratingText
parameters.description: The text shown besides the rating.

parameters.name: primaryText
parameters.description: The primary text shown in the content block.

parameters.name: secondaryText
parameters.description: The secondary text shown in the content block.

parameters.name: tertiaryText
parameters.description: The tertiary text shown in the content block, this will only show up when detailType is moviesTV.

parameters.name: quaternaryText
parameters.description: The quaternary text shown in the content block, this will only show up when detailType is moviesTV.

parameters.name: locationText
parameters.description: The location text shown in the content block, this will only show up when detailType is location.

parameters.name: bodyText
parameters.description: The body text shown in the content block.

parameters.name: button1Theme
parameters.description: Colors of button 1 will be swiched depend on the specified theme (light/dark). Default to dark theme

parameters.name: button2Theme
parameters.description: Colors of button 2 will be swiched depend on the specified theme (light/dark). Default to dark theme

parameters.name: button1Text
parameters.description: The text shown on button 1 the content block.

parameters.name: button2Text
parameters.description: The text shown on button 1 the content block.

parameters.name: button1Style
parameters.description: The button style of button 1 the content block, can be outlined or contained. Defaults to contained.

parameters.name: button2Style
parameters.description: The button style of button 2 the content block, can be outlined or contained. Defaults to contained.

parameters.name: button1PrimaryAction
parameters.description: The action of button 1 that is triggered when the Button is selected.

parameters.name: button2PrimaryAction
parameters.description: The action of button 2 that is triggered when the Button is selected.

parameters.name: button1AccessibilityLabel
parameters.description: Voice over will read this string when the user selects button 1.

parameters.name: button2AccessibilityLabel
parameters.description: Voice over will read this string when the user selects button 2.

parameters.name: ingredientsText
parameters.description: The ingredients title text shown in the content block.

parameters.name: ingredientListItems
parameters.description: Array of list item datasources to present in the ingredient list.  See documentation on list item datasources for required data signature.

parameters.name: ingredientsHideDivider
parameters.description: Toggle to hide the divider that appears at the bottom of each item to help separate it from the content below. Default to false.

parameters.name: imageCaption
parameters.description: The image caption is a title or brief explanation of the image.

parameters.name: entities
parameters.description: Array of entity data bind to this layout

parameters.name: imageShadow
parameters.description: Boolean to turn the drop shadow on or off on the image

AlexaDetail.description: Alexa Detail is used to display information about an entity, such as a person, place, thing, or event. In this case, we've outlined four variations: Generic, Movies & TV, Location, and Recipe. Detail is optimized for long-form structured content with a short voice synopsis.

parameters.name: detailType
parameters.description: There are 4 different types of layout to select: generic, moviesTV, location, recipe. Default to generic.

parameters.name: detailImageAlignment
parameters.description: Image alignment on the layout, can be left or right. Default to left.

parameters.name: backgroundColor
parameters.description: Color value to use as background color for layout.

parameters.name: backgroundImageSource
parameters.description: URL for background image source.

parameters.name: backgroundVideoSource
parameters.description: URL for background video source.

parameters.name: backgroundScale
parameters.description: Image/video scale to apply to background image/video. Defaults to best-fill.

parameters.name: backgroundAlign
parameters.description: Image/video alignment to apply to background image/video. Defaults to center.

parameters.name: backgroundBlur
parameters.description: Toggle to apply background blur. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundColorOverlay
parameters.description: Toggle to apply overlay scrim to background image/video. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundOverlayGradient
parameters.description: Toggle to apply gradient to background image/video. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundVideoAutoPlay
parameters.description: Toggle to autoplay background video(s). Defaults to false.

parameters.name: backgroundVideoAudioTrack
parameters.description: Audio track to play on. Defaults to foreground. EM can select foreground | background | none.
